Research suggest that participation in a structured exercise', 'programme has the ability to improve calf muscle pump function and dynamic calf', 'strength', '23,29 As a pilot study 60 participants will be recruited; with intention of 30', 'participants completing the trial; previous pilot studies conducted similar to this trial', 'have used similar sample size.', 'References', '1.
